name: Randomizator
description: Location - the scientific base for conducting experiments on the movement of matter in space and time. The results were remarkable, but suddenly the situation changed. Powerful AI (used on the base) out of control.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DirectX 9.0 Место на диске: 80 MB
